content.prompt: Which of the following best explains a regional pattern of union membership in the early twenty-first century as depicted in the maps?

choices.label: Wages generally increased in southern states.
Heavy industries in upper Midwest states experienced decline.
Agriculture along the West Coast saw dramatic changes.
Migration to the Midwest outpaced that of other regions.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
